prakshepanaya: • adarojan matha randa pawathina pilikawan (purushayinta, piyayuru pilika athi bawata saka kerena ho sthapitha kara athi piyayuru pilika); • nokala aabadhitha roga (adhiwruddhiya, hayipororayisis, hayiparplaktininiya aadiya); • palopiya nala wala badha kirim samanga sambandha wu kanthawange bhawaya; • dimbakosha pilika, • gonodotropika homona aushadha ho diliraye oonama sanrachakayak sandaha aasathmikatha.
